scenario_text.value:
Man, who ever heard of these stupid Sovereign
Monsters, anyway?
We need to find them all real quick, or...

Or Kunemon’s home’s done for. Ain’t that some
shit!

Yo, that’s too much, man! I didn’t say I was
just doing it for you!
C-cram it. Whose face is getting red, here...
(Something has changed about him for sure.)

(When we first came here, he was a selfish
wimp. Now he’s more concerned for others.)

(Now he’s even thinking about Kunemon and the
rest... The surprises just keep on coming.)

(He’s more worried about the Kemonogami than
he is about himself. It’s amazing.)

Tch... Of course you’d show up now. Damn it,
why do you always have the worst timing?!

But that’s enough griping. We’ll handle this
ourselves, Kunemon!
